verbs.description: at albany [V: med] a widow grief leads to a space for loved ones to learn bad news guilt - ridden and grief - stricken over her husband death darryl mcgrath raised 35 000 to build a room in his name at albany medical center where family members can learn bad news about their loved ones in private jim room is on the seventh floor of the hospital near the cardiac catheterization lab where individuals often go for heart surgery or testing darryl mcgrath albany albany medical center writer jim mcgrath times union albany new york albany med cape cod
